sourceMeaningMnemonic: They <radical>say</radical> that <radical>flowers</radical> held by a <radical>turkey</radical> on a <radical>stool</radical> are good to <kanji>defend</kanji> yourself with. Even better than a guard dog they say. People are so confused by the turkey sitting on a stool holding flowers that they just lose their will to fight. This turkey is great to defend yourself and your home.
meaningInfo: Picture this turkey holding its flowers while sitting on its stool. Hear it gobbling as it defends everything around it with its mere presence.
readingMnemonic: The only thing this flower-bearing turkey can't <kanji>defend</kanji> against is <reading>Go</reading>dzilla (<ja>ご</ja>). Godzilla is pretty much undefeatable, especially for a turkey. The turkey is totally unable to defend anything from the mighty Godzilla.
readingInfo: Imagine Godzilla approaching the flower turkey. Hear Godzilla roar as the turkey gobbles in fear before being crushed beneath the massive and scaly foot of Godzilla.
